original_text: That evening, a man called Joseph went to see Pilate. Joseph was from a town called Arimathea. He was a good man and he was one of the group of important Jewish leaders. He was waiting for the time when God would start to rule his people in his kingdom. Joseph bravely asked Pilate for the dead body of Jesus to bury it.
korean_text: 아리마대 사람 요셉이 와서 당돌히 빌라도에게 들어가 예수의 시체를 달라 하니 이 사람은 존경 받는 공회원이요 하나님의 나라를 기다리는 자라

sentences.original_text: That evening, a man called Joseph went to see Pilate.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 저녁에 요셉이라는 사람이 빌라도를 만나러 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: Joseph was from a town called Arimathea.
He was one of the group of important Jewish leaders.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 중요한 유대 지도자 그룹 중 한 사람이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He was waiting for the time.
God would start to rule his people in his kingdom.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그의 왕국에서 그의 백성을 다스리기 시작할 때를.

sentences.original_text: Joseph bravely asked Pilate for the dead body of Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 요셉은 용감하게 빌라도에게 죽은 예수의 시신을 요청했습니다.
